review:
Bana harika bir çocukluk yaşattığın için çok teşekkür ederim eski dostum... 

Bugün rock/metal müzik seviyorsam en büyük sebebi senin o harika menü müziklerin ve ağabeyin ''King of The Road'' oyununun efsane soundtrack'leriydi...

Hayatımda oynadığım ilk oyunlardan biri. 5 yaşında bir çocuğu o kocaman cüsseli amerikan tırlarına aşık etmiştin. (halen daha aşığım :)

review:
I purchased this game through Steam in February of this year. Today I have tried to play it again, but every time I click the icon, I get a message saying, X 18 WoS Haulin. I have tried restarting my laptop, restarting the game, deleting things to make sure I have room and nothing works. I am not happy as I paid for this game, and now I can't even play it.

Unhappy Steam customer!!!

review:
[h1] Bazen geçmişe dönmek istersin... [/h1]

Otobüs, Türkiye harita modlarıyla, .ogg format dosyaları algılayan radyo sistemiyle harika bir oyundu.

Sabah 6'da uyanmanın uykusuzluğuyla birlikte okul yorgunluğunun çökmesine rağmen deli gibi oynardım, radyosu için yaptığım arabesk, rap karma playlist, karlı bölgelerde müzik eşliğinde gezmek falan... Ne güzel zamanlarmış.

[b] Geri gönderin beni o zamanlara, lütfen. [/b]

review:
30.06.2022 01:23/22

Oyunu satın aldım, oynamak için değil anılarımı hatırlamak için.
Çocukluğumu süsleyen bir oyundu kendisi, pek çok özelliği vardır güzel.
Örnek olarak polis sizi kovalayabiliyor ve şirket tırlarınızı yolda görebiliyorsunuz! 
2006 senesinden bahsediyoruz, harika özellikler.
Çıktığı yıla göre harika bir oyundu, hala da öyle.
Özellikle soundtrack'i harikaydı.
Saygılar

author: {'steamid': '76561198006569623', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 39, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 39, 'last_played': 1638624670}
review:
Surprised on how similar this game was to how I remember it from my childhood. 
It has been 15 years since I played it, but the banter commands for radioing other NPC truckers while driving was still in my muscle memory. 
So glad to see this game still being playable and on steam after so many years since it's release.
Fantastic game, and I am glad to have so many memories with it <3

author: {'steamid': '76561198085615396', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 3228, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3125, 'last_played': 1620975621}
review: This is an old school simulator. Fun and nostalgic. This game is all about haulin' and watching strange things happen with AI vehicles. A lot of little things like CB radio communication (to ask for weather or traffic), buying used trucks and taking contracts with specific companies makes this game so unique and great. If you don't mind some bugs and those "strange" things happening, even though we have American truck simulator that is so much more sophisticated, Haulin' is so cool to play!

author: {'steamid': '76561198349074846', 'num_games_owned': 21, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 260, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 124, 'last_played': 1655456086}
review: Küçüklüğümde ETS 1 ve bu oyunu oynardım. Hatta bu oyuna otobüs modu yüklettirirdim. O zamanlar kontroller ve grafikler güzel gelse de şimdi ETS 2 ye alışınca garip geliyor. Ayrıca tır sürerken radyo dinlemek için MP3 formatında müzikler attığınız zaman kabul etmiyor. İnternetten dosya formatı dönüştürücüsü ile müzikleri OGG dosyasına dönüştürmeniz gerekiyor. Güzel bir oyun nostalji yapmak isteyenler için bire bir.

author: {'steamid': '76561198869838515', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 18, 'playtime_forever': 293, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 214, 'last_played': 1629476145}
review:
American Truck Simulator's very cool but somewhat less attractive grandfather. I never played this game until after 200+ hours of ATS and 100+ of ETS2. They graphics are dated but very good for games if that ere. It took a few gaming sessions, but I was able to tweak the Xbox controller settings to a decent level of response. They controller still feels a bit off and in cab steering wheel animations are jerky but again far better than many games from other devlopers. 
Surprisingly this game does two things better than it's grandsons ATS and ETS2. I like that upgrading to a sleeper cab has more than cosmetic consequences. You can actually use them at any time to rest and restore fatigue. The fatigue settings and do seem to be a bit too strict. They can be turned off with by editing the configuration file, changing fatigue setting from 1 to 0.
Another thing that I like better is how the driver manager works. There is an actual logbook including graph but no countdown of minutes until you get fined for driving tired. You have to keep track of your driving hours.
This is a good diversion or franchise history lesson for SCS truck sim fans.

author: {'steamid': '76561198288510604', 'num_games_owned': 80, 'num_reviews': 49, 'playtime_forever': 353, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 154, 'last_played': 1694197977}
review:
Oh the nostalgia. I remember this game from my childhood. My dad was a truck driver and got me this game from I think Gamestop a while back when I was little. I lost the game and during my last days of high school I had a strong urge to want to find this game just to play it once again. It hasn't changed much from then. I personally like the game. Sure, there isn't much to look at but you have to remember this game is old. Like released back in 2006 old. The textures were pretty good for its time. If you want to enjoy a game where you can travel from Miami Florida all the way up to Vancouver, then this will give you some enjoyment. Overall 8/10! 

If you came for the Nostalgia then get the game. Bring back the nostalgia!

author: {'steamid': '76561198029146808', 'num_games_owned': 2352, 'num_reviews': 56, 'playtime_forever': 218, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 6, 'last_played': 1571429774}
review:
Пятая часть в серии "18 Wheels of Steel" от SCS.
В игре присутствует свободный мир, обширный выбор грузовиков и огромная карта. По сути - это дополнение к "18 Wheels of Steel: Convoy". Обновлены текстуры, подредактирована и увеличена карта, слегка изменены очертания населенных пунктов, а вокруг них построены объезды, что упрощает транзит и делает его более реалистичным. Вот, собственно, и всё. Зато предоставлена возможность сеть за руль автопоезда со сдвоенным трейлером, причем не в специальной миссии, а когда захочется, потому что такие грузы есть чуть ли не на любой базе.

Игра детства. Покупать, скорее всего, только для ностальгии.

Русификатор можно скачать здесь: https://www.gameru.net/games/29200/files

author: {'steamid': '76561198349703862', 'num_games_owned': 1286, 'num_reviews': 18, 'playtime_forever': 9, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 9, 'last_played': 1550663581}
review: 可能是我没有搞懂。我不得不承认，本作在画面上已经有了相对明显地进步，汽车展示功能也是一个很有趣的想法。但至少本作的地图所能提供的指示无疑不如前作那样清晰明了，甚至这种缺陷已经足以影响玩家本应得到提高的游戏体验。虽然很遗憾，但考虑到设计方面的欠缺，我不能推荐这部游戏。

author: {'steamid': '76561198387891864', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 2409, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2287, 'last_played': 1521691776}
review: This is a good game if you have an older pc that can't run the latest games and you want to practice backing a tractor trailer. The physics of the trailer behaves like in real like when you are backing it. Some truck yards even have alleys you can back into if you want. The only problem is this game doesn't have a  clutch option (although it has manual shifting) so the air brakes loses too much air when you are practicing backing and use the brakes a lot, (fortunately it doesn't lock like in real life). I like the F2 mirror option popup that thats lets you look without moving the mouse very helpful for backing, and driving. The forward driving part is okay but it doesn't feel like a real big rig, is kinda its almost halfway there, but there is something missing when it come to feeling like real semi. But its an older game so you can't fault it too much, for what it is its pretty good. Although the hanlding of the turning does behave like a tactor trailer and you don't want to jump those curbs or take out light post when makin a tight right turn. And the jake brake sounds decently good. The map is real big and the scenery is decently nice for an older game. There are plenty of delivery option and trailers and trucks to choose from.
